TextView.android:text: Did the contact visit the clinic for symptom screening?
Has the contact received anti-TB treatment in the past?
If YES, what kind of TB was it?
If YES, what was the outcome of last anti-TB treatment?
Does the contact have cough for more than 2 weeks?
Does the contact have weight loss or failure to thrive?
Does the contact have reduced playfulness? (In younger children)
Does the contact have adenopathy for greater than 1 month?
Does the contact have night sweats?
Any investigations requested for this contact?
